page.title: 17VIEWS ON SCHOOL -SECONDARY
page.content: ALL OF THE PEOPLE INTERVIEWED SAID THAT PUNISHMENT DOES NOT ALTER THE PUPIL'S ATTITUDE.WHILST THEY ALL LIKED UNIFORM, HALF OF THEM THOUGHT THAT IT WAS NOT NECESSARY.HALF OF THEM LIKED SCHOOL DINNERS BUT THOUGHT THAT THEY WERE EXPENSIVE.THEY LIKED THE CAFETERIA SYSTEM. ALL OF THEM SAID THAT EXAMINATIONS WERE NECESSARY AND THEY APPROVED OF THE NEW G.C.S.E.SYSTEM.HALF OF THEM SAY THAT THEY SPENT MOST OF THEIR TIME REVISING. THEY ALL AGREED WITH HOMEWORK,MOST HAVING 1 TO 2 SUBJECTS TO DO EACH NIGHT.3/4 OF THEM THOUGHT THAT THIS WAS TOO MUCH. 3/4 OF THEM LIKED SCHOOL OVERALL.
